avoncap 0.0.0.9000
  • Get started
  • Reference

    Getting started

    avoncap.Rmd
    #library(avoncap)
devtools::load_all()
#> ℹ Loading avoncap
out = ggrrr::outputter(tempdir())
#> directing output to: /tmp/Rtmp5N1Yu2

    Input data location

    • first level directories.
    • Filenames need some indication of database year (either as 20-21,21-22,… or as y1,y2,…)
    # The data input directory on my development machine:
options("avoncap.input" = "~/Git/avoncap-analysis/input")

# The directory structure:
fs::dir_tree(path = avoncap::input(),glob="*/cache/*",invert=TRUE)

    Load data sources and recording provenance

    ethn = avoncap::load_data("ethnicity")
#> caching item: /home/terminological/Dropbox/Data/bristol-cases/cache/cached-7c2df7204ebfcefa62584d0381bd09ef-8cab5da8cf25e06a1c50cb96710658de.rda
#> Loaded 19546 rows from 2 files, (9957+9589=19546)
rawData = avoncap::load_data("nhs-extract")
#> caching item: /home/terminological/Dropbox/Data/bristol-cases/cache/cached-7c2df7204ebfcefa62584d0381bd09ef-b301449cfbbf25a41d008b2f13bf695c.rda
#> 1 parse issues in raw files. Check the parse_issues attrbute.
#> Loaded 15262 rows from 6 files, (777+893+7105+624+5347+516=15262)
avoncap::save_data_source_info(ethn, rawData, .file = out("file-info.txt"))

    Augmenting the data

    # devtools::load_all()
augmented = data %>% avoncap::augment_data()
#> could not compute SOC diagnoses: This is normal for the NHS AvonCap extract: Problem while computing `diagnosis.pneumonia = ... %>% factor(levels = c("no", "yes"))`.
#> falling back to diagnosis.standard_of_care_COVID_diagnosis
#> falling back to admission_swab data point for covid status
#> could not compute consent: This is normal for the NHS AvonCap extract: Problem while computing `admin.consent_withheld = ... %>% factor(levels = c("no", "yes"))`.
#> falling back to diagnosis.standard_of_care_COVID_diagnosis
    unname(readable_label_mapping(augmented))
